sourcesContent:
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Signup() { const senddata = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(e); sessionStorage.setItem('usermail',e.target[0].value); if(e.target[1].value === e.target[2].value){ sessionStorage.setItem('password', e.target[1].value); alert('signup successsful. please signin...') window.location.pathname='/signin'; } else { alert('Invalid Data'); } } return ( <>

Ecommerce Admin

Create your account

Already a member?{' '} Click here

) }
